Lanzhong county level city in Nanchong 南充[Nan2 chong1], Sichuan

sentences.english: One day our destination was the silk producing area surrounding the county seat of Langzhong.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我们的目的地是阆中县城周边的丝绸产区。

sentences.english: Langzhong had already been a famous scenic area nationwide in the Tang and Song Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋时期，阆中已是全国著名的旅游胜地。
